full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GNANG GSUM CHOS NYID KYI 'KHOR LO BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,SNYING PO'I 'OD GSAL SNYING THIG BSGOM 'DOD KYANG, ,'DI 'DRA'I GNANG 'DI DENG SANG MTHONG BA DKON, ,DE BAS MYUR DU 'DO GSAL LA 'GRUB 'DONG NA, ,YI GE 'DI NYID SNYING BZHIN GCES PAS ZUNG, ,GANGS RI THOD KAR AO RGYAN RDZED GNAS SU, ,RANG BZHIN RDZOGS PA CHEN PO'I RNAL 'BYOR PA, ,KLONG CHEN RAB 'BYAMS BZANG POS BKOD PA STE, ,SKAL LDAN SNYING GI BU RNAMS DGA' BAR BDZOD, ,RDZOGS PA CHEN PO GSANG BA SNYING TIG GI GDAMS PA, GNAD GSUM CHOS NYID KYI 'KHOR LO ZHES BYA BA THEG PA MCHOG GI RNAL 'BYOR PA KLONG CHEN RAB 'BYAMS KYIS BKOD PA RDZOGS SO, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,DGE'O,, ,,
